Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.subtitle: By accessing or using our website, event services, or participating in our community, you agree to the following terms and conditions.
Terms.welcome: Welcome to GDG on Campus MUST. By accessing or using our website, event services, or participating in our community, you agree to the following...

useOfServices.item1: You may not use our services for unlawful or malicious purposes.
useOfServices.item2: You are responsible for the security of your own account or registration data.

eventParticipation.title: Event Participation
eventParticipation.item1: Tickets or registrations are personal. Transferring without approval is prohibited.
eventParticipation.item2: Disruptive behavior may result in removal without refund.

intellectualProperty.content: All logos, designs, and original content on this site are owned by GDG on Campus MUST or credited creator.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party & Open-Source Content
thirdParty.content1: Any content or tools used from external sources (e.g., open-source libraries, speaker slides) remain the property of their respective owners.
thirdParty.content2: We respect and attribute all such content, and you should too when reusing or remixing materials.

privacySection.title: Privacy Policy
privacySection.intro: Your privacy is important to us. We only collect essential data and are transparent about its use.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.item1: Name, email, university, and major (for event registration or certificates)
dataCollection.item3: Website usage data and analytics for improving user experience

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.item2: Improve our events and community programs
dataUsage.item3: Maintain community engagement records and analytics

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.item1: Access and review your personal data

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We do not sell your data to third parties. Some event tools may use external platforms with their own privacy policies.

codeOfConduct.title: Code of Conduct
codeOfConduct.intro: GDG on Campus MUST is committed to providing a harassment-free, inclusive community for everyone.

expected.title: Expected Behavior
expected.item1: Respect everyone regardless of background, experience level, or identity
expected.item2: Use welcoming language and provide constructive feedback
expected.item3: Support beginners and promote collaborative learning
expected.item4: Show empathy and kindness toward other community members

prohibited.title: Unacceptable Behavior
prohibited.item1: Harassment, bullying, or intimidation of any kind
prohibited.item2: Discrimination, hate speech, or sexist/racist remarks
prohibited.item3: Disruption of talks, events, or community activities
prohibited.item4: Sharing of inappropriate content or unsolicited advances

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to update these terms at any time. Any major changes will be communicated via email or community announcements.

notification.title: Notification of Changes
notification.content: We will notify users of significant changes through email or community announcements at least 30 days before they take effect.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.intro: If you have any questions about these terms, our privacy policy, or our code of conduct, please contact us using the information below.
